mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no as boardNo, b.board_title as boardTitle, m.name, b.board_created_at as boardCreatedAt, b.board_updated_at as boardUpdatedAt FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.board_member = m.id ORDER BY b.board_no DESC

SELECT b.board_no as boardNo, b.board_title as boardTitle, b.board_content as boardContent, m.name, b.board_created_at as boardCreatedAt, b.board_updated_at as boardUpdatedAt FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.board_member = m.id where b.board_no = #{id} ORDER BY b.board_no DESC
